job_description:
Job Description:
1. Design and program PLC/HMI systems for production line automation, integrating sensors and actuators for process control and monitoring.
2. Develop pick and place robotics and automated clamping systems using cost-effective automation solutions for manufacturing operations.
3. Implement lean manufacturing principles through automation projects focused on efficiency improvement and waste reduction.

Requirements:
1. Technical Expertise: PLC programming (Mitsubishi, Siemens, Omron), HMI design, sensor/actuator integration, Arduino & ESP32, SolidWorks & AutoCAD, and can use of electrical measurement tools (multimeter & oscilloscope).
2. Programming: Ladder Logic, C/C++, MATLAB (preferred).
3. Additional Skills: Lean Manufacturing, Karakuri automation, system design, feasibility studies, robotics (pick & place), 3D printing, prototyping, documentation, testing, and cost-effective automation solutions.
